segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfold in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her plate, missing the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling out, but she stands there unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle might lead to a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, he could fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, trusting him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies, but it feels like innocence lost.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets will be damaged by the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is peaceful, unaware of the trouble inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This happy home might face an accident soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they see the dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR
